pronunciation: AM'MONITE, [Cornu ammonis, from Jupiter Ammon, whose statues were represented with ram's horns.]Serpent-stone

definitions.text: cornu fossil shell, curved into spiral, like horn; of various sizes, the smallest grains three feet in diameter. This fossil found in stratums of limestone and clay, and in argillaceous iron ore. It smooth ridged; the ridges strait, crooked undulated.
